TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE( TRUE, ISNULL(lkpt_ID), 'New', lkp_DisbursementGross != DisbursementGross OR lkp_BalanceGross != BalanceGross OR lkp_ChgOffPrinGr != ChgOffPrinGr OR lkp_GrAppv != GrAppv OR lkp_SBA_Appv != SBA_Appv OR lkp_Borrower_ID != Borrower_ID OR lkp_Geography_ID != Geography_ID OR lkp_Bank_ID != Bank_ID OR lkp_LoanDetails_ID != LoanDetails_ID OR
lkp_DisbursementDate != DisbursementDate OR lkp_ChgOffDate != ChgOffDate, 'Changed', 'No Change' )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: op_flag

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1
